named-query.name: queryBeverages
named-query.query: Select new de.uniba.dsg.dsam.model.Beverage(b.id, b.manufacturer, b.name, b.promotion, b.quantity, b.price) From BeverageEntity b

named-query.name: queryPromotiionalIncentives
named-query.query: Select new de.uniba.dsg.dsam.model.PromotionalGift(i.id, i.name,i.type) From PromotionalGiftEntity i

named-query.name: queryTrialIncentives
named-query.query: Select new de.uniba.dsg.dsam.model.TrialPackage(i.id, i.name,i.type) From TrialPackageEntity i
